title: 大家永别了
txt_content: 我们这里。。。。地震了。。。可能。。。。。，这是真实的事情，当然大家祝福我吧

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content: 不会吧....祝福你没事好了

replies.author: KOL梦幻
replies.txt_content: 地震了？！？！保重……祝福你

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: 看在你曾经狂水的份上，祝福你吧

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: - -3连 你v5

replies.author: indeed
replies.txt_content: 不信中

replies.author: ghostboyz
replies.txt_content: 保重.论坛的基友与你同在..

replies.author: howard
replies.txt_content:
台灣在兩個板塊交界處
日本在四個板塊交界處
這些地震平常的地方是要每天都穿壽袍就是了?
只要沒到7級都還可以=口=lll

replies.author: JedBoy_LD
replies.txt_content: 嗯嗯 你加油 我们祝福你！

replies.author: LSG
replies.txt_content: 大叔你别挂啊，你挂了我鄙视谁去啊，啊啊啊，大叔，好惨啊，啊啊啊啊啊，大叔，额，好像没挂呢吧
可怜滴娃    保重

replies.author: numnum
replies.txt_content: 。。。祝福你啊、、、虽然有可能玩了点儿

replies.author: hhyx
replies.txt_content: 啊。。保重。。。还没死吧

replies.author: kirbykirby
replies.txt_content: 你是北京的？

replies.author: 起名忒俗
replies.txt_content: 快跑啊   还愣着干甚

replies.author: raikvolt
replies.txt_content: 我们会记住你的。。。。

replies.author: jingli159
replies.txt_content: LZ加油啊!!!!!!!

replies.author: a6331255
replies.txt_content: 屁屁叔叔白白了~你别死就好了~你这么难才升到V7的啊！不能这么就死了啊~你要为论坛的基佬着想啊！

replies.author: 小兲
replies.txt_content: 要活下来啊！

replies.author: JerryGuo
replies.txt_content: 咱们2012年见~

replies.author: WDWDDWWDWD
replies.txt_content:
雖然距離遠
但友情是無界線的
